extra.enrollment_requirement: ENCH OR CHEM 211, ENCH OR CHEM 212 OR ENCH OR CHEM 281

basic.description: A survey of practical spectroscopic and spectrometric methods for the determinations of the structures of organic and inorganic compounds. Methods will include nuclear magnetic resonance, electronic, infrared/Raman spectroscopy, and mass spectrometry. Tutorials will involve solving compound structures using spectroscopic data, and include an introduction to computational methods in spectroscopy.
basic.subject: CHEM
basic.title: Methods of Structure Determination
